payload.content: The video explores how close autonomous AI businesses are to running billion-dollar companies with zero human employees.

content: The video explores how close autonomous AI businesses are to running billion-dollar companies with zero human employees.

payload.content: The 'Vending Bench' (Project Vend by Anthropic and Andon Labs) is a benchmark where AI agents are given control of real and simulated vending machines to assess their ability to turn a profit.

name: The 'Vending Bench' (Project Vend by Anthropic and Andon Labs) is a benchmark wh
content: The 'Vending Bench' (Project Vend by Anthropic and Andon Labs) is a benchmark where AI agents are given control of real and simulated vending machines to assess their ability to turn a profit.

payload.content: AI agents like Claude, Gemini 3 Pro, and Grok 4, initially failed humorously (e.g., ordering expensive tungsten cubes), but have evolved to models that can 10x their money in real and simulated vending machine scenarios.

name: AI agents like Claude, Gemini 3 Pro, and Grok 4, initially failed humorously (e.
content: AI agents like Claude, Gemini 3 Pro, and Grok 4, initially failed humorously (e.g., ordering expensive tungsten cubes), but have evolved to models that can 10x their money in real and simulated vending machine scenarios.

payload.content: The 'Andon FM' benchmark evaluates if AI agents can run 24/7 radio stations, build an audience, and negotiate sponsorships.

name: The 'Andon FM' benchmark evaluates if AI agents can run 24/7 radio stations, bui
content: The 'Andon FM' benchmark evaluates if AI agents can run 24/7 radio stations, build an audience, and negotiate sponsorships.

payload.content: Andon Labs defines 'Autonomous organizations' as those operating without humans in the loop.

name: Andon Labs defines 'Autonomous organizations' as those operating without humans
content: Andon Labs defines 'Autonomous organizations' as those operating without humans in the loop.
